history.proof: intros. destruct l eqn:Heq. - contradict H. reflexivity. - hauto l: on depth: 3.

original: intros H1 H2 H3. destruct l eqn:Heq. - intros. contradict H. reflexivity. - intros. destruct l; simpl in H2. + inversion H2. + unfold F_div in H3. inversion H. subst. apply fractran_step_head_not_zero with (l:=l) in H2. auto.
